title: BRIEF-Havilah Resources Entered Exploration Agreement To Explore Bassanio IOCG Target
text:
BRIEF-Havilah Resources Entered Exploration Agreement To Explore Bassanio IOCG Target

Commodities 25 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 12:50)

BRIEF-Havilah Resources Entered Exploration Agreement To Explore Bassanio IOCG Target Oct 9 (Reuters) - Havilah Resources Ltd : * ENTERED INTO AN EXPLORATION AGREEMENT TO EXPLORE BASSANIO IRON OXIDE COPPER GOLD (IOCG) TARGET * EXPLORATION AGREEMENT WAS SIGNED WITH BENAGERIE GOLD & COPPER PTY LTD (BGC)

BRIEF-Havilah Resources Entered Exploration Agreement To Explore Bassanio IOCG Target
description: BRIEF-Havilah Resources Entered Exploration Agreement To Explore Bassanio IOCG Target
